title: For Sale: PSA & SGC Graded Cubs all from 2 - 5.5
author: Rascal1010

posts.post_title: For Sale: PSA & SGC Graded Cubs all from 2 - 5.5
posts.post_content:
After working on my T206 collection of Cubs for a number of years, my collecting interests have shifted over time and I would like to focus my collecting elsewhere.  All cards listed will have high resolution scans of fronts and backs available hopefully by this evening and I will be happy to email scans of any cards to prospective buyers (Scans are attached of all available cards as of this am).  I am open to reasonable offers and will be willing to discount for any purchases over 3 cards.  All cards will ship via USPS with tracking and insurance at no extra charge.  Payment via Paypal, or other arrangements can possibly be made.

Email any requests for scans to [url]stevea@tractorpartsasap.com[/url]

"I'll take it" will take precedence over any cards that are in negotiation with buyers and they will be considered SOLD at that point. All cards will be sold on a first come first serve basis.  Emails will be answered in the order they are received.

The only trades I will consider at this time are for Gabby Hartnett cards I do not currently have, or 1939-46 Salutation Exhibit Cards that I need to complete my set (Very short list)

Any questions, feel free to email me,

Thanks,
Steve

Mordecai Brown (Chi. On shirt)SC 350/30SGC2 $OLD 
Mordecai Brown (Cubs on Shirt)SC 150/30SGC2 $250   
Chance (Yellow Portrait)SC 350/30SGC2 $OLD    
Overall (Hands @ Face)SC 350/30SGC 3 $70 
Pfeister (Throwing)SC 350/30SGC3 $85 
Sheckard (No Glove Showing)SC 150/649PSA2 $OLD  
Steinfeldt (with Bat)SC 350/30PSA3.5 $90 
Tinker (Bat off Shoulder)SC 350/30SGC3 $300 
Tinker (Hands on Knees)SC 150/30)PSA2 $235
All orders from DAY 1 have been shipped and tracking numbers have emailed to buyers.  Still a lot of nice cards available, and many HOFer's left yet.
Top notch communication and service! Thank you Steve. Im looking forward to my addition.

List of cards has been updated and SOLD cards removed.  All day 2 packages have been shipped and tracking #'s sent to buyers.

Still some really nice cards available!
List updated with most recent sold cards removed.
